## ActorOptions interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ActorOptions<TLogic extends AnyActorLogic> 
```

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |

|  [devTools?](./xstate.actoroptions.devtools.md) |  | boolean \| [DevToolsAdapter](./xstate.devtoolsadapter.md) | <p>_(Optional)_ If <code>true</code>, states and events will be logged to Redux DevTools.</p><p>Default: <code>false</code></p> |
|  [execute?](./xstate.actoroptions.execute.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ Whether state actions should be executed immediately upon transition. Defaults to <code>true</code>. |
|  [id?](./xstate.actoroptions.id.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ The custom <code>id</code> for referencing this service. |
